item.title: Using R in a blog
item.description: You can do many things with R, including writing blogs and blog posts. To build this site, I am using the Hugo static website generator, and the blogdown package. Using R and embedding code in the text This means I can embed R code directly in the text. The blogdown::serve_site() function then renders the content automatically (by first running rmarkdown and then letting Hugo build the site). So I can do this:
